title: Thunderbird ceased to work on January 1, 2025 -  after changes made the Thunderbird
content:
On January 13, 2025, Thunderbird was changed in a way that made it not function with Optus.

Please give me very precise instructions on how to make it work again.

I have donated to Thunderbird's development, but have not used it for 10 months because of this problem.
creator: raymond.kennington56

title: Archive folder--can't delete
content:
I have several accounts in Thunderbird. I have never (intentionally) used the archive option. Yet, one of my accounts now has an Archive folder that I cannot delete. No option exists when right clicking the folder and I cannot drag it to the trash. It has no emails in it, and never has. Its possible its been there a while and I just didn't notice, bu AFAIK its new.

I have gone to Account Settings Copies & Folders...and the "Keep Message Archives in:" is unchecked. Further, I checked all accounts to see if one of those might be 'checked'...just with a folder specified in a different (wrong) account. Not it.

I've restarted. I'm at a loss as to how to clean this up.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thunderbird 144.01...that I upgraded to 145.0 when checking the version to report here. No change.
creator: thunderbirder

title: layout when a message from the IN Box is open
content: 15 Nov. 2025 I contacted a very savvy computer consultant in my area, and he was able to connect my Thunderbird to my Google account, so I can finally use my Thunderbird software again. I have a question about the appearance of a message when I open the message. In the past, I always had the list of my contacts on the left side of my screen, aligned vertically, when I had an open message on my screen. That is missing now. I would like to restore that feature, and I cannot find a way to do that. Thank you.
creator: cyanicka46

title: schedule message delivery
content: Is there a way to make thunderbird sending an email with a delay? I want to write an email now, but I want it to be sent in two days. Is this possible and how?
